Class: PushCam

plugins/ai/camera/push-cam. PushCam

new PushCam(opts)

Constructs a camera that follows a sprite. Called a push cam because the player seems to "push" the camera around. Note that this should not be constructed directly, but rather via the plugin factory method sn.createCamera('pushcam') on the engine.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
opts Object <optional>
 An object with assorted options set in it.
follow
The ID of the sprite to follow, e.g. follow:"player1"
